entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:47 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
